page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: Generally speaking the area enjoys a high standard of living. Most houses have all or many of these features; central heating,fitted carpets,television,telephone, at least one car and domestic electric gadgets such as washing machines. Homes with children may have a home computer and portable television and most children have bicycles. The diet of traditional British fare has changed in rtecent years and now because shops stock food from all over the world,pizzas,lasayne,curries,chinese dishes are common.Also many fruits from abroad-sweet potatoes,kiwi ect. Most homes,especially with children own a pet of some kind. Most men of working age are employed and about half the wives aso have full time or part-time employment.
